entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 06:47 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Rain showers or drizzle beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
